plot: A stallion known as "The Black" is the leader of a band of wild horses. A cowboy is determined to capture and break him.
title: The King of the Wild Horses
plot_es: A stallion known as "The Black" is the leader of a band of wild horses. A cowboy is determined to capture and break him.
original_name: The King of the Wild Horses
plot_en: A stallion known as "The Black" is the leader of a band of wild horses. A cowboy is determined to capture and break him.
